name: Always Caring Health Care Services, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Always Caring Health Care Services, LLC is a Home Health provider based in West New York, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $76.2M in Medicaid payments across 889K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $76.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
